title: Calories in a Bag of Popcorn
meta_description: Discover calories in a bag of popcorn, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for buttered microwave style.
h1: Calories in a Bag of Popcorn
assumptions: Standard microwave popcorn bag, butter-flavored, fully popped (approx. 100g popped kernels).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, flavor (plain, butter, kettle), bag size, and popping method. Check labels for precise values.

quick_answer.text: A typical buttered microwave bag of popcorn contains about 450 kcal and 45g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a bag of plain popcorn?
faqs.a: A bag of plain air-popped popcorn has about 150-200 kcal, much lower than buttered varieties.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a bag of popcorn?
faqs.a: Around 45g total carbs, with 8g fiber, for a standard buttered microwave bag.
Yes, buttered bags often have 700mg sodium or more due to seasoning.

faqs.q: How does bag size affect calories in popcorn?
faqs.a: Smaller bags (50g) may have 200-250 kcal; larger theater-style up to 1,200 kcal.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a bag of popcorn?
faqs.a: Typically 7g protein per bag, mostly from the corn kernels.
